item.title: Making a static site with Hugo
item.description: So, Hugo. Why a static site generator, and why exactly Hugo, you ask? Well, a static site is much more faster, secure and simple to host compared to any dynamic site (read: Wordpress). In this part, we’ll set up all the things we need for hugo to work. Installing Hugo First, go to Hugo Releases, and scroll down to the downloads section. There, choose the binary that is suitable for your system and download it:
